name: Surprise T-Mate Gift
description: Unlock the mystery! Each time you reach a new milestone, you stand a chance to receive an exclusive Surprise T-Mate Gift. This reward is designed to keep you motivated and excited, offering a special surprise to recognize your hard work. Keep pushing your limits and let T-Mate reward your effort in unexpected ways!

name: DUROS Gift
description: Achieve greatness and earn the DUROS Gift! With every workout, you accumulate points that bring you closer to this reward. The DUROS Gift is a special treat for dedicated people, featuring a surprise to celebrate your commitment. Stay motivated, keep earning points!
